item.title: Democrats' uncoordinated response to Trump speech a 'mistake': Sen. Schiff
item.description: ABC News’ Jonathan Karl interviews Sen. Adam Schiff, D-Calif., on "This Week."

item.title: WATCH: 3rd eaglet is officially here
item.description: The third eaglet finally hatched Friday night in Big Bear, California, as many watched on the Big Bear bald eagle live nest cam.
